abstract: To help mark this banner season for mushrooms, Gary Lincoff, expert mycologist, author and educator, answers readers questions and identifies fungi in reader photos.
snippet: To help mark this banner season for mushrooms, Gary Lincoff, expert mycologist, author and educator, answers readers questions and identifies fungi in reader photos.
lead_paragraph: To celebrate us this fall's bumper crop of mushrooms, Gary Lincoff, author of the Audubon Society's "Field Guide to North American Mushrooms," past president of the North American Mycological Association and instructor at the New York Botanical Garden, is identifying your mystery fungi and fielding your questions.
